author: Special Correspondent
text:
Krishi Vigyank Kendra, Sikkal, holds interaction with farmers

A one-day awareness programme on “preliminary steps for rabi season” was organised under the auspices of Krishi Vigyan Kendra at Sikkal near here on Saturday. Demonstration sessions and interaction were held in which scientists from Krishi Vigyan Kendra and the Tamil Nadu Rice Research Station, Aduthurai, clarified the farmers’ doubts.

Explaining the objective of the programme, A. Anuradha, Programme Co-ordinator, KVK, Sikkal, said the awareness aimed at guiding farmers towards choosing the right crop for their soil and the importance of integrated pest management. She said the season was used for raising pulses, coconut, groundnut, and vegetables.
title: Farmers get ready for rabi season
